mapper.insert: INSERT INTO own_seal (own_seal_id,own_seal_fileName,own_seal_settle,own_seal_company, own_seal_sender,own_seal_chapCategory,own_seal_filePath,own_seal_remark,own_seal_creatTime,own_seal_status,own_user_id) VALUES (#{own_seal_id},#{own_seal_fileName},#{own_seal_settle},#{own_seal_company}, #{own_seal_sender},#{own_seal_chapCategory},#{own_seal_filePath},#{own_seal_remark},#{own_seal_creatTime},#{own_seal_status},#{own_user_id}) on duplicate key update own_seal_id=#{own_seal_id},own_seal_fileName=#{own_seal_fileName}, own_seal_settle=#{own_seal_settle},own_seal_company=#{own_seal_company}, own_seal_sender=#{own_seal_sender},own_seal_chapCategory=#{own_seal_chapCategory}, own_seal_filePath=#{own_seal_filePath},own_seal_remark=#{own_seal_remark} ,own_seal_creatTime=#{own_seal_creatTime},own_seal_status=#{own_seal_status}
mapper.update:
update own_seal
own_seal_fileName=#{own_seal_fileName},
own_seal_settle=#{own_seal_settle},
own_seal_company=#{own_seal_company},
own_seal_sender=#{own_seal_sender},
own_seal_chapCategory=#{own_seal_chapCategory},
own_seal_filePath=#{own_seal_filePath},
own_seal_remark=#{own_seal_remark},
own_seal_creatTime=#{own_seal_creatTime},
own_seal_status=#{own_seal_status}
where own_seal_id=#{own_seal_id}
